AppointmentScheduleLog.name: AppointmentScheduleLog
AppointmentScheduleLog.description: Stores service appointments of each service Resource.

AppointmentScheduleAggrId.description: The appointment scheduling aggregate associated with the appointment scheduling log.

IsUsedForResourceUtilization.description: Indicates whether the appointment scheduling log is used for deriving the appointment scheduling aggregate.

Name.description: The name or ID of the AppointmentScheduleLog object.

RelatedRecordId.description: The service appointment, resource absence, event, or any other related record associated with the appointment scheduling log.

ResourceUtilization.description: The number of minutes the service resource already has scheduled appointments for.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource associated with the appointment scheduling log.

UsageType.description: Specify the product associated with the AppointmentScheduleLog object.
